         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18093349">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content18093349">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18093350">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18093350">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18093350">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Company Financial Data
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18093350">
          <div id="boxatt18093350" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21252254">
              <a id="link_21252254" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21252254,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21252254}); ">
               Google: Company websites
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Explore individual company websites. Look for sections targeting shareholders or investors.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21231947">
              <a id="link_21231947" href="https://www.sec.gov/edgar/searchedgar/companysearch.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21231947,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21231947}); ">
               EDGAR Company Filings
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Open access. Since 1934, the SEC has required disclosure in forms and documents. In 1984, EDGAR began collecting electronic documents to help investors get information. The SEC's new system requires data disclosure — the next step to improve how investors find and use information. Here is a
               <a href="http://abeweb.org/proceedings/proceedings12/12McGee.pdf">
                guide
               </a>
               for importing data from EDGAR into Excel.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18281047">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18281047">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18281047">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Corporate Mission/Strategies/History
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18281047">
          <div id="boxatt18281047" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21435008">
              <a id="link_21435008" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21435008,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19721252}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. An "aggregator database" containing the full text of trade journals and other business periodicals. Known for its subject indexing. Strong on information about both industries and companies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21435011">
              <a id="link_21435011" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21435011,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21252254}); ">
               Google: Company websites
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Explore individual company websites. Look for sections targeting shareholders or investors.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21719775">
              <a id="link_21719775" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/aboutSeries.do?inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;seriesId=0IAD" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21719775,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21719775}); ">
               International Directory of Company Histories
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A reliable source of historical information for many companies: American and foreign, private and public, past and present-day.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18093352">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18093352">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18093352">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Consumer Information (Markets)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18093352">

          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Competitors
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18303155">
          <div id="boxatt18303155" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21469909">
              <a id="link_21469909" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21469909,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21469909}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Competitor information linked to the Company Dossier.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21469941">
              Market Share Reporter
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Trexler Library call # 338.74 M345s
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18303883">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18303883">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18303883">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           SWOT Analysis and Prospects
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18303883">
          <div id="boxatt18303883" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21470540">
              <a id="link_21470540" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21470540,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730852}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Largely full text database of scholarly and trade journals covering all aspects of accounting, business, and economics. Full text journals include, among many others, the Harvard Business Review (1985-present, including all cases originally published in the Review), Academy of Management Journal, Accounting Review, and Journal of Marketing. Also includes several hundred in-depth reports on publicly traded companies. To access, click on the Company Profiles tab at the top of Business Source Complete.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21720235">
              <a id="link_21720235" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/aboutSeries.do?inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;seriesId=0IAD" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21720235,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21719775}); ">
               International Directory of Company Histories
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A reliable source of historical information for many companies: American and foreign, private and public, past and present-day.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18093351">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18093351">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18093351">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Industry Data
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18093351">
          <div id="boxatt18093351" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21252374">
              Annual Statement Studies
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library level B 657.3 R627a
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21252321">
              <a id="link_21252321" href="http://www.reuters.com/finance/stocks" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21252321,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21252321}); ">
               Reuters
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Open access. Search for a publicly-traded company by ticker or company name, then click on "financials" to see company and industry ratios, calculated for the latest fiscal year end.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21434944">
              <a id="link_21434944" href="http://www.weddles.com/associations/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21434944,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21434944}); ">
               Weddles Association List
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A directory of trade associations, which can be good sources of industry-level data.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18118548">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18118548">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18118548">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Intellectual Property
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18118548">
          <div id="boxatt18118548" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21655003">
              <a id="link_21655003" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/publicdomain" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21655003,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21655003}); ">
               Art and the Public Domain
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library guide to open-access sources of art.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21252632">
              <a id="link_21252632" href="http://search.creativecommons.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21252632,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21252632}); ">
               Creative Commons
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Open access. Gateway to photos and graphic art licensed for not-for-profit or for-profit use. In general, no permission need be requested. Always give attribution. Licenses vary, so read each license carefully.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4889349" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18093356">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18093356">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18093356">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18093356">
          <div id="boxatt18093356" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21219840">
              <a id="link_21219840" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21219840,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21219840}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21219841">
              <a id="link_21219841" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21219841,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Summer Business Institute', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21219841}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
